title: Correction: Disney's Reedy Creek Improvement District's Fitch rating
text:
Fitch has placed the debt of Disney's Reedy Creek Improvement District in Florida on rating watch negative following state legislation to dissolve the special taxing district. The debt was not downgraded as wrongly stated in an article on December 5.

Source: 2022 'Correction: Disney's Reedy Creek Improvement District's Fitch rating' FT.com 7 December. Used under licence from the Financial Times. Â© The Financial Times Limited 2022. All Rights Reserved.
